titles.title: Grace Greater Than Our Sin (Julie Johnston)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sin and despair like the sea waves cold Threaten the soul with infinite loss. Grace that is greater, yes, grace untold Points to the refuge, the mighty cross.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dark is the stain that we cannot hide. What can avail to wash it away? Look! There is flowing a crimson tide. Whiter than snow you may be today.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Marvelous, infinite, matchless grace, Freely bestowed on all who believe. You that are longing to see His face, Will you this moment His grace receive?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
